alert.note: Alert for Dodge (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dodge County through 445 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a severe thunderstorm near Stanton, or 8 miles east of Northfield, moving south at 30 mph. This storm has had a history of producing hail over 1 inch in diameter. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... West Concord around 425 PM CDT. Mantorville and Claremont around 435 PM CDT. Dodge Center and Kasson around 440 PM CDT. Hayfield around 445 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
